website_summaries.verdict: The ideal purchase for customers wanting a cozy blanket with a pup-inspired style.
pros: Polyester microfiber offers an exceedingly comfortable feel
Customers appreciate the supremely soft, luxury fabric
cons: Colors not true to online depictions
Does not hold up well for dogs that like to chew

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Blanket. Dog loves it!!!
customer_reviews.text: My COSMO loves the blanket. He likes lying on it, he likes if I put it on him while he is sleeping. It's sooooo soft . Awesome !!
customer_reviews.author: Gaya

customer_reviews.title: Super soft and hold up well
customer_reviews.text: I bought a few of these blankets in different colors for my new puppy, and she loves them! They are super soft and are holding up well to the abuse of a young puppy. I've washed them a few times already, and they are still in great shape (no pilling). I highly recommend these :)
customer_reviews.author: Melissa K.

customer_reviews.title: Dog blanket
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for a young lady that we had hoped would live but is now resting peacefully. This was an awesome way of snuggling her to the end.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Chenworth Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great Blanket
customer_reviews.text: Very plush and soft, my dog loves these blankets. This is his second one because he likes to play rough with them, and his others went to absolute shreds BUT... It lasted an entire year before it was too ripped to keep. For the price, if we end up getting him a new one once a year, this is well worth it! It cleans easily as well.
customer_reviews.author: DK MannTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: So soft but be wary of the colors
customer_reviews.text: Tbh, my dog doesn't like it, yet. And I'm not sure about the background color. In some light it looks gray, some times pale blue. But I wish everything was this soft. I just love it! Also a good size for the price. Most I have looked at are smaller. Edited to add: I ordered the taupe. The bones are brown but the background, is, as you can see, more of a slate gray.
customer_reviews.author: chi-kat

customer_reviews.title: Super soft  and durable!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my new puppy and he loves it! I have washed it multiple times already and it has stayed soft and nice! It is a good size for his crate, not too big and not to small. He is a newfypoo and I feel like he will use it to lay with even when he is 100lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Bertha578

customer_reviews.title: Good, though pattern is not double-sided
customer_reviews.text: Great blanket, great durability, and super soft. Nice size for the price. The pattern is only on one side (with the bones), the reverse side is just a plush. For example, I got the pink so one side is the pink with bones, the reverse is just all pink plush color. Would be nice if it was on both sides.
customer_reviews.author: Proper Bostonian

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: We've been sleeping with this blanket a few weeks before the puppy arrives so that it will have our scent on it. I'm absolutely in love with how soft it is and will be sad when I have to give to to the dog to sleep with instead of us. Super happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Meg.Ras

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Cuddly Blanket
customer_reviews.text: I love this blanket for my dogs and me! The blanket is so soft and cuddly and is large enough to cover my legs when I am lounging on the couch with my dogs. Launders well. I would recommend this blanket to anyone who wants a lightweight and cuddly blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Henhenk

customer_reviews.title: Great blanket!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!!! Super soft!!!!! Holds up great in the wash!!!! I bought several for home and car. ...kind of slippery if you’re using it on the seat of a car that’s vinyl or leather...
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: My dog has loved this blanket since he was a puppy
customer_reviews.text: My dog has loved this blanket since he was a puppy, and it is so soft that even my kitten will nap on it whenever he gets the chance. It is very soft and easily washable (I've washed it many many times and it comes out soft and cozy). It does not shed also!
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are so soft and practical!!! My very very very "high maintenance" (spoiled) dog normally requires at least 2 queen size plush blankets to sleep on, until these. He only needs one to sleep and chooses it over all the other ones, which I am thankful for because I have my living room back instead of it being littered with huge blankets everywhere. My favorite part of this new blanket is how easy it is to wash! No fuzzies left behind, no rips or tears after washing and drying, and just as soft. I bought 2 of them, one for the living room and one for the couch, and my dog loves then both and so do I!
customer_reviews.author: mk

customer_reviews.title: Love this blanket.
customer_reviews.text: I got a Bone Dry blanket as a gift for my new puppy. I loved it so much I had to buy another one. It’s super soft and washes without shedding. Other dog blankets did not wash well at all. They left pills of fabric on everything. From now on I’m buying only Bone Dry blankets. Thank you Dii for carrying that brand. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Gracie Muzzi

customer_reviews.title: SMALL, CUTE & SUPER SOFT!
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is very cute and very soft. I wish it would be bigger but being that I bought it for my dogs, I guess it’s fine. It would also be great for a kid. It’s just a tad bit too small for my liking.
customer_reviews.author: WReid

customer_reviews.title: Softest blanket ever!
customer_reviews.text: I'm almost tempted to get one of these for me, it's so soft! My puppy loves cuddling up in this soft blanket. It's nice and durable, he chews on it incessantly and I have not seen so much as a single stray thread. I've washed the blanket several times and it's still as soft as ever!
customer_reviews.author: Beautyq25

customer_reviews.title: Great dog blanket
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves it. Love the softness. Will buy again. Beautiful color.
customer_reviews.author: Denzie White

customer_reviews.title: Soft, Easy to clean, Beautiful design! 🙂
customer_reviews.text: I love how soft it is, so easy to clean and dries fast! The design is beautiful and I love how its etched. And best of all, our corgi loves to snuggle in it! Either on the bed, or in the car. We live in Seattle so it gets chilly and wet. He falls fast asleep in it. Just look at that smile! 😍 Happy corgi, happy mommy.
customer_reviews.author: iReviews

customer_reviews.title: Love this blanket!
customer_reviews.text: Love this blanket! It's soooooo soft, bought it for our new puppy. He isn't old enough to come home yet, but I'm sure he'll love it! If not I will be using it. Such a nice blanket for the price. It's a nice big size will definitely still work when she's full grown.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathon Talmadge

customer_reviews.title: First of all I love the blankets they are very soft and the dog ...
customer_reviews.text: First of all I love the blankets they are very soft and the dog loves his blankets. BUT I bought two to and the color of the bones is not the same. On one blanket you can see that the brown around the bones sticks out and make it kind of pop but on the other it is more pale. Looks a bit funny on the couch because my intention was to create a look that is more like it’s one big blanket. Easy to wash and dry.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Laura Alice Approved
customer_reviews.text: I almost don’t want to say how great this blanket is because it’s fantastic, and soooooo soft, and a very generous size, and all for a reasonable price! Just put another in the cart. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, soft dog blanket!
customer_reviews.text: My dog and I both love these blankets! I have purchased two of them so far- the quality is excellent, and they’re just so soft!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Harrell

customer_reviews.title: Super snuggly - more gray than taupe
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this in taupe and as you can see in the photo it's really just gray (with dark brown outlined bones) but I don't mind. It's super soft and minky. The perfect size for my mini doxie puppy.
customer_reviews.author: Noelle

customer_reviews.title: Super soft
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to clean, holds up great through many washes, still super soft
customer_reviews.author: Brandon S.

customer_reviews.title: This blanket is perfect size for my dog
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is perfect size for my dog...I have a Shitzu. I bought it so he could have it at the kennel when I went out of town. I made sure that it had my scent on it before I dropped him off and it helped calm him down. It is so soft. He loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: Kris Johnson

customer_reviews.title: super soft blanket
customer_reviews.text: super soft blanket. my puppy loves to shred everything...carpet, towels, beds...he loves this blanket and has shown no interest in doing anything but cuddling in his crate. i will buy more of these...much thicker and softer than expected!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Softest Blanket - Even After Washing!
customer_reviews.text: My beagle never wanted to use his dog bed until I got this. It is incredibly soft that I just wanted to keep it but I decided to just let the dog have it. I've washed this several times and it's still just as soft. I'm also happy the print is only on one side so can potentially be reversible but I've always kept it print side up. I'm looking into another dog bed and I know I'll have to get this blanket for my beagle.
customer_reviews.author: Eny Santana

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly this is a beautiful blanket...
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure what to expect...but in reality this blanket turned into such a nice purchase. It is soft, washes very well in hot water, and my puppy loves it. It's a nice color too with a sweet pattern. I would buy another one when we need it.
customer_reviews.author: Cinja

customer_reviews.title: Super duper soft and cute
customer_reviews.text: We got this as a puppy blanket for our 8 week old puppy who we knew would have accidents. It is super duper soft and even after way more washes than we’d like to admit it has stayed soft- one corner did start to come undo from teething but we’ll chalk that up to the puppy not the blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Lovely blanket
customer_reviews.text: This blanket has become a favorite of my pup. We got it, and she promptly chewed a dime sized hole in it. You know, to make sure it was actually a good blanket. She loves to lounge on it and eat her banana slices for breakfast. It washes well, even with the hole in it. =)
customer_reviews.author: Sunny Dodds

customer_reviews.title: Love this blanket!
customer_reviews.text: My dog absolutely loves this blankie. Its super soft & with already two washes in, its still as soft as the first day. A great size too!!
customer_reviews.author: Ninamarie Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality
customer_reviews.text: Our Bo loves this blanket . He recently had an abscess and he had a drainage tube . I had to wash his blanket frequently basically everyday since it’s was getting full of blood . GUESS WHAT? it’s still as soft as it was the day we got it ! hasn’t fallen apart no little lint balls of any kind . Great quality !
customer_reviews.author: Visionary_Ladyj

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Durable
customer_reviews.text: I love these blankets, I had to buy a second one for my bedroom (for where doggo sleeps on the bed). They are very easy to clean—just throw in the wash, they hold up and dry quickly. The blankets are very soft, too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Soft, large, my dog loves it! However it had an odd stain across the fold, as though it had been wiped across a dirty surface. Otherwise I would have given it a five.
customer_reviews.author: PM in Az

customer_reviews.title: Cute and soft.
customer_reviews.text: We have a yellow lab with a snuggling addiction. So we bought this blanket for his soft crate that he sleeps in at night. It's so soft! He loves to cuddle with it, even during the day. And the design is so cute.
customer_reviews.author: E&E0715Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Get it, it's so worth it!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best things I have purchased here. Material is so soft, cute design, weighs good and our dog loves it...
customer_reviews.author: Miko

customer_reviews.title: Happy dog
customer_reviews.text: My dog likes it in her crate, im almost jealous of how soft it is
customer_reviews.author: tyler wadford

customer_reviews.title: Great Find!
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely soft blanket for my dog. It's design isn't so obvious that you notice the bones - it looks luxurious and my doggie loves to cuddle in it. I've had it for a year and it's still wearing very well after multiple washings. Hope they continue this.
customer_reviews.author: Carefree Living

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: My puppy loves this blanket. Although she prefers to lay on my jackets and sweaters because of the scent, if that's not available she'll nap on this. It's really soft and stays soft after washing. The only thing is that the dog smell gets really strong after awhile, so wash it regularly, but you really should be doing that anyways. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: great dog blanket, my dog has one of these already and loves it. This is a replacement for when his current one needs to go, lol.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: A Great Soft Blanket
customer_reviews.text: This is a great blanket. It is so soft. My little baby loves it. It is so nice and warm that I bought a few of these and I kept one for myself. So when Ellie is snuggling on the sofa with her blanket, so is Mommy.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Nice, soft, but doesn't hold up to a chewer.
customer_reviews.text: Very soft, and my pup likes to snuggle in it, but it doesn't hold up to his chewing habits. He likes to wrap the antler that he chews inside of the blanket and after about three or four weeks, there are tears. We'll hang onto it as long as it doesn't become dangerous for him, but probably won't be getting another. We need a stronger blanket.
customer_reviews.author: S. Pauciello

customer_reviews.title: Super Soft Blanket
customer_reviews.text: This is sooooo soft and luscious. Have not tried it with our puppy yet but I am sure she will love it
customer_reviews.author: sherdw876

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our dog to keep in my husband's car and it's amazing!
customer_reviews.author: KLS

customer_reviews.title: best drying towels a doggie could have
customer_reviews.text: Truly soft, durable, easy to clean and most of all super absorbent.
customer_reviews.author: deezer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome but horrible smell!
customer_reviews.text: It shocks me to know this is a dog blanket! It is so soft and is the perfect thickness. I almost want to keep it for myself, but I couldn't do that to my German shepherd because he completely loves this blanket. My only con is when I first received the blanket, it had a horrible foul smell to it that made me actually want to puke (sorry if it's tmi). I immediately threw it into the wash before giving it to my dog, since that smell would've been unbearable. Overall, it's a great blanket and is super cute!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love it!!
customer_reviews.text: very soft the new puppy will love it..i got two one for the pup and myself because how soft it is lol
customer_reviews.author: Jamie long

customer_reviews.title: I'm so disappointed!! I was so excited about this adorable ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm so disappointed!! I was so excited about this adorable blanket especially after the reviews!! The blanket itself is super cute, soft and warm!! Unfortunately my light pink blanket was stitched on one entire side with black thread! I unfortunately returned this item!!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie & Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great Product. Received wrong color.
customer_reviews.text: This blanket seems great so far, but I ordered taupe & received a grey/blue color. :(
customer_reviews.author: Jenny R.

customer_reviews.title: These are so soft, you may not want to give it to the dog to use!!!
customer_reviews.text: These blankets are super soft. I bought two of them. I used them for my puppy. I sent on to the breeder to have it scented and another over his dog bed. He loves these blankets and they help keep him warm! I know $14.99 is expensive for a dog blanket but these wash well and are amazing. Just remember dry on low, and do not use fabric softener, which I am learning as a dog mom is pretty standard with most dog products that are washable. I bought a navy and a grey for my pup, and a pink for my friends dog. All are holding up great to daily use!
customer_reviews.author: Tfoster

customer_reviews.title: Love this blanket!
customer_reviews.text: My boy loves this blanket! He sleeps with it every night and brings it out of his kennel to the living room to lay on when he hangs out with us. It’s super soft, great size, and easy to clean since he sheds so we’ve washed it a few times already. He also likes chewing on it from time to time and it hasn’t torn or frayed.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa

customer_reviews.title: I love that I can throw this in the washer/dryer and ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a VERY hairy, constantly shedding dog. I love that I can throw this in the washer/dryer and it comes out completely clean and holds up to the wear and tear I put I through. Looks brand new every time I wash it.
customer_reviews.author: Carey

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this blanket super soft and its her new favorite
customer_reviews.author: Mickey

customer_reviews.title: I really liked them at first as they are a good size ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these blankets after reading so many positive reviews. I really liked them at first as they are a good size and so soft. Unfortunately the pink and tan all started getting lint on everything after a few washes. I tried washing them a few times to see if it would stop but it didn’t. I bought them at different times so I don’t think it’s a fluke.
customer_reviews.author: Genevieve Bolin

customer_reviews.title: Very soft!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice pet blanket. Very soft and the perfect size for my pups. Wish it came in more colors. Like the bone design.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Super soft
customer_reviews.text: I have not washed yet so I do not know how durable it is but it is soo soft.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: So soft
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is so so soft. My sweet pup has loved it since the first day we brought him home. Easy to wash as well. I highly recommend for your fur baby 💕
customer_reviews.author: KJK

customer_reviews.title: Super soft - my dog loves his blankie!
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST blanket. It is so soft and cuddly. I only wish it came in a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Liz D'Arcy

customer_reviews.title: Really soft blanket, but defective
customer_reviews.text: My puppy and I love this blanket for its softness but unfortunately, I received a defectively printed blanket. I did not notice until we were already on our way to pick up our puppy to bring her home so I had to use it. Super disappointed. Would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Bordewyk

customer_reviews.title: Great as a doggie blanket with a bonus!
customer_reviews.text: Great as a doggie blanket with a bonus! Super soft and enjoyed by the dog and the person. Plus it's the best glasses cleaner of ever used. Happy dog and clean and streak free glasses.
customer_reviews.author: TDietz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and price.
customer_reviews.text: We recently got a brand new puppy. I wanted him to have a soft blanket to comfort him in his crate and bed. So many pet blankets are expensive and/or hug. This blanket is the right price and size. It is the same size as a standard throw blanket AND our little guy loves it. We have washed it several times and it is holding up nicely. I am going to purchase a second one so that we have a backup.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah C.

customer_reviews.title: Cozy but not big enough
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this blanket to cover my couch as my dogs tend to jump on it at times and leave some marks here and there. I just use it as just one of their blankets now because it's not as big as I though it would be. It barely covered half my loveseat but I would have to say the quality is great, soft and very cozy. Wish it was mine to use!
customer_reviews.author: Dimes

customer_reviews.title: Pitty adores it.
customer_reviews.text: My little pitty loves being wrapped up in this and tucked into bed at night when it’s cold. It washes super well and has remained soft the whole time.
customer_reviews.author: KMA & TKA

customer_reviews.title: Toasty Warm
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely the softest blanket and quite large. Our Giorgi loves this blanket. We loved our first blanket, so we bought a second one. Excellent purchase. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne White

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute
customer_reviews.text: Our “big baby” loves this as her nighttime blanket 🐶💕. It’s really soft and such a cute blanket with the dog bones on it.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Thomas

customer_reviews.title: so amazing, i got it for my 9lb dog i ...
customer_reviews.text: so amazing, i got it for my 9lb dog i ordered a small and it was so much larger then what i expected, could use it on my couch as a throw blanket. soooo soft. exceeded my expectations and my dog loves it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I love the material cloth and the design. My dog Maui love it too, but because she's an American Pitbull Terrier I wished that would be bigger. I Recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine M Adams

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Nice big and soft blanket for your pet. Added this to her pen and will help keep her warm. Just the right size for a crate
customer_reviews.author: Granny Paula

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this blanket I bought him 2, one for the couch and one for the bed Worth the money
customer_reviews.author: diane

customer_reviews.title: it’s so soft and comfortable and cute
customer_reviews.text: it’s a pet blanket....but I totally use it for myself too..... it’s so soft and comfortable and cute. you or your pet will love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All snuggled up
customer_reviews.text: He normally shakes things off when we put anything on him, not this blanket. He really likes it.
customer_reviews.author: J.G

customer_reviews.title: Ordering another one!!
customer_reviews.text: Softest blanket! I want one for myself!! My puppy loves sleeping on it rather than his bed. I’m ordering another one!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Great light weight pet blanket
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a light blanket for my sheltie boy. I was impressed on how soft and cooling it was
customer_reviews.author: Mike Spangler

customer_reviews.title: Soooo pretty and soft
customer_reviews.text: Plush blank for our puppy. Washes well. Bone imprint is a cute, subtle pattern. This is so nice it could be used for a human (if it were larger and didn't have bones.)
customer_reviews.author: Reed R.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: LOVE! I have had to wash it almost every ...
customer_reviews.text: LOVE ! I have had to wash it almost every single day since I purchased it. Sometimes twice a day because I have a brand new puppy. Holds up wash after wash. Soft as can be.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Hetrick

customer_reviews.title: ADORABLE!
customer_reviews.text: OMG! Our new Labrador puppy loves his blanket. He sleeps with it, chews on it, plays tug of war with it. I can’t believe how cute he is with it! I’m going to buy another larger one! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix Ragland

customer_reviews.title: Love this for my mini schnauzer puppy
customer_reviews.text: Love this for my mini schnauzer puppy. I use it to line her bed, which keeps it cleaner. Easier to wash the blanket, and it washes/dries well. Just ordered two more - one for her car carrier now that it's getting cold, and one to have as a backup when another is in the wash.
customer_reviews.author: PJS

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my small Chihuahua. She absolutely loves to sleep in this blanket.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and washes well
customer_reviews.text: My puppy is wrapped in this every night. He won’t go to sleep without it.
customer_reviews.author: thinkn333

customer_reviews.title: So doggone soft - Thinking of buying my own..
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in November. It has been through several washes and to this day has held its color and oh-so-freakin soft quality(no signs of pilling or shedding). I looove it and most importantly my dog loves it. It kept him warm during the winter and even as it gets warmer it's one of his favorite things to cuddle up to. A definite recommend.
customer_reviews.author: RS Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Super soft doggie blanket. Want another one already
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is so soft, yet the material does not feel too warm when touching the skin. Beautiful color with mostly grey and a hint of chocolate color. Perfect match with my dog’s bed.
customer_reviews.author: Garfieldrok

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE This Blanket!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this blanket! It is so cute, so soft, and both my dog and I love it (I bought 2, 1 for her and 1 for me).
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda

customer_reviews.title: saved crate training
customer_reviews.text: My puppy loves curling up in this blanket and was having trouble whining/crying in the crate until I put this soft blanket in there with her, which she just loves to nap on. We are literally buying a second one now!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: but the blanket really is as wonderfully soft as they say
customer_reviews.text: If you want "Blue Bone," be aware! Someone in labeling has mistakenly put blue color stickers on the "Bone Gray" packages. If you really want blue right now, you might get gray. It has happened to me twice, but the blanket really is as wonderfully soft as they say. I just wanted to make people aware who are ordering right now.
customer_reviews.author: LynH

customer_reviews.title: SO SOFT - Our Dog Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: Our dog loves this blanket. It's SO SOFT and almost the same texture as his favorite toy. He snuggles with it during naps and at bedtime. It's also a great price and washes easily without shedding.
customer_reviews.author: S in Seattle

customer_reviews.title: Love it, pup loves it
customer_reviews.text: Love it, pup loves it, so soft and washes nicely! For as lightweight as it is it keeps my dog very warm.
customer_reviews.author: Sue K. Corriea

customer_reviews.title: Light weight. If you have a chew or not ...
customer_reviews.text: Light weight. If you have a chew or not the blanket for you. It is very soft and warm if you have a cuddly buddy that doesn't chew.
customer_reviews.author: Candace

customer_reviews.title: Perfect small dog blankets
customer_reviews.text: This dog blanket is THE BEST! The right size for smaller dogs, I have a mini doxie and a pug mix - have ordered now about 10 of these....just perfect! Very soft, easy to wash/dry and last a long time. Look great too!!
customer_reviews.author: Party Planner

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Cozy, Good Size too.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this blanket, as does my dog, who likes to burrow under the softness of the material. The humans occasionally steal it as a lap blanket too, heh. The size is great for that.
customer_reviews.author: A Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great pet blanket
customer_reviews.text: Soooo soft. Perfect size. I was really happy with this blanket
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great blanket for your pets
customer_reviews.text: My chi pup loves laying on this. Wash and dry and it’s good as new.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Super soft and love the pattern. We have several blankets but there is no mistaking this blanket for anyone else's but the dogs. Only wish it was a little bigger but its perfect for my chihuahuas.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... and a the puppy loves this blanket and I like the blanket because if she makes a mistake in ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a kennel I have for a puppy and a the puppy loves this blanket and I like the blanket because if she makes a mistake in her kennel, it is soaked up by the blanket and I just have to take it out and wash it no mess on the bottom of the kennel.
customer_reviews.author: suztip

customer_reviews.title: Comfy pups!
customer_reviews.text: Look how comfy this lil pup is! He slept through the night all bundled up in this blanket. I’ve only had it a few days so can’t speak to durability but he has been chewing on it and it is holding up so far. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Came with a hole
customer_reviews.text: I really like this blanket but it came with a hole in it. Not worth sending it back but not sure I'd buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality blanket
customer_reviews.text: Warm, soft, and fuzzy - exactly what I wanted. My puppy loves this blanket. I use it on one of his dog beds or in his car carrier when we go places. He likes to drag the blanket around and it's held up great so far.
customer_reviews.author: Katy H

customer_reviews.title: Snows it is for her down time. ooo soft ...
customer_reviews.text: Snows it is for her down time.ooo soft...our schnoodle loves this blanket! Only let her use them when nite/crate time oming up. She instantly k
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: I rarely write reviews but this blanket is so plush ...
customer_reviews.text: I rarely write reviews but this blanket is so plush and soft and cozy for my little dachschund chihuahua rescue that I had to say thank you! He came from Arizona and is about to spend his first winter in Iowa. As the nights get chillier, we are grateful for the coziness of this blanket. I will order more for my son's little pups.
customer_reviews.author: nancy a conybeare

customer_reviews.title: Soft Warm & Cute
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my puppy warm....its very soft & cute....would definitely purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Favorite blanket
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful blanket, well made and super soft! Golden Retriever puppy’s favorite blankey! Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Arrbar

customer_reviews.title: Super soft
customer_reviews.text: So soft and cozy. My schnauzer loves his new blanket!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa L

product_meta.title: DII Bone Dry Microfiber Pet Blanket for Dogs and Cats, 36x48", Warm, Soft and Plush for Couch, Car, Trunk, Cage, Kennel, Dog House
product_meta.description:
Color:Gray

 "Bone Dry loves pets!


 DII Bone Dry microfiber pet blankets come in an assortment of colors, perfect for your pet to lie on. DII pet blankets are excellent for travel or nap time for your adorable pet. These snuggle pet blankets fit perfectly in any kennel to keep your pet warm, cozy, and dry. DII offers wonderfully made microfiber pet blanket that features a cute and adorable bone shape embroidered design. These pet blankets make perfect gift for new pet owners 

 Give your pet the warm and cozy blanket for their bed/sleeping space


 Made of high quality microfiber fabric, lightweight and easy to care for; this blanket can be stored in your car for on the go trips for your pet or at home. These lovely cat or dog blankets are very soft, super cute, and warm, perfect for adding a little more extra comfort for your pet and protection for your couch, carpet, car, bed, floor, or chair. 

 So Many Great Options


 To view more Pet Blanket options search: Bone Dry Pet Blanket or visit our brand page at amazon.com/dii for a full range of products. Our pet products include: fabric and wicker storage baskets, pet beds, ceramic food bowls, drying mitts and towel, pet blankets & more! 

 Our Pet Products Include:


 • Wicker Pet Baskets – Three Sizes!
• Storage Bin-Three Sizes in Various designs
• Non-Skid Pet Food Bowl
• Pet Bath Towel
• Pet Blankets
• Pet Bed-Machine Washable
• Cage Liner and Under Cage Mat
• Food Mat
"
feature_bullets: COZY BLANKET FOR SMALL, MEDIUM, AND LARGE CATS AND DOGS: Blanket measures 36x48", suitable for cats and dogs in different breeds and sizes
MATERIAL AND CARE: 100% Polyester Microfiber with refine stitching for durable and long-lasting use. Machine Wadhable; Wash in Cold Water-Gentle cycle, Turble Dry Low
COMFY AND PREVENT SCRATCHES FROM YOUR FURNITURE: Ultra-soft and plush blanket provides comfort for your pet and protection for your couch, carpet, car, bed, floor, or chair
LIGHTWEIGHT AND EASY TO CARRY: This blanket is great bedding for a pet kennel, crate, and cage, and can be stored in your car for on the go trips for your pet or at home.

MORE BONE PET PRODUCT OPTIONS : Bone Dry offers various pet products including pet bed, pet towels, pet mats, pet bowls & blankets, and storage bin, but for more options search: Bone Dry Pet Blanket ed or click the Bone Dry link at the top of the page to explore our other collection.
